$(function() { 
         $(""#btnSave"").click(function() { 
           html2canvas($(""#widget""), {
            onrendered: function(canvas) {
                theCanvas = canvas;
                document.body.appendChild(canvas);
                // Convert and download as image 
                Canvas2Image.saveAsPNG(canvas); 
                $(""#img-out"").append(canvas);
                // Clean up 
                //document.body.removeChild(canvas);
            }
          });
        });
    });
